name: smallbooks
description: An application for finding and sharing short stories.

scripts.client-install: cd client && npm install && npm i bootstrap reactstrap react-router-dom uuid react-transition-group redux react-redux redux-thunk axios react-cookie @fortawesome/fontawesome-svg-core @fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons @fortawesome/react-fontawesome @fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons@prerelease
scripts.server-install: npm install express mongoose concurrently bcrypt && npm install -D nodemon

author: Jake Grafenstein
